resources.string: Entrepreneurship Development Cell of NIT Durgapur formerly known as NEN NIT Durgapur Students Chapter is the one and only independent cell of the institute, of national importance, inculcating an entrepreneurial environment across the campus.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Upload the videos when wifi is available
We are a team of like-minded people, specialized in development of Android App Development creating new trends across the app space. Glad to Help in anyway!
Got any queries? We are happy to help!

Do you always bite your nails as you see your favourite IPL team bid for players at the auctions? Have you always felt that given the amount of money, you could build a better team? Well, E-Summit 2018 gives you the chance to make the IPL team you have always dreamt of…Come and put your best bid forward...
You have a start-up idea..But is it feasible? E-Summit 2018 brings to you a perfect testing ground for your ideas- the start-up workshop. Lets see how good you are….

Have you ever wondered about the pros and cons of Cryptocurrency? What if Demonatisation occurs again in India? Wanna know the reasons and problems behind the failure of few start-ups? You are at the right place! Know answers for such questions from intellectuals and other economists. Interact with them! So what are you waiting for ? Brace yourself, winter is gone and E-summit is coming!

Where better to learn about the challenges of an entrepreneur than from the horse’s mouth? This E-Summit 2018, catch the best of the best from the industry…Here is your chance to meet highly successful people like Gaurav Kapoor, Prantik Sinha ,Kunal Vora, Ranodeep Saha and Shaan Suhas Kumar. So what are you waiting for?

Pen is mightier than the sword…So when you have a ground breaking star-up idea or ideas on Green Entrepreneurship write it down and send us an article in about 350-500 words at nennitdurgapur@gmail.com or WhatsApp at 9474848809 And the best articles will get the chance of being showcased on igniting minds web portal(Run by sir Kalam's family)! Exciting prizes for top entries from Igniting Minds Who knows may be your writings turn to reality…….

Digital Marketing. Just another fancy word you should use to sound smart or is it a real deal? This E-Summit the Digital Marketing workshop conducted by "EI Systems" in association with Entrepreneurship Development Cell, NIT Durgapur will help you learn everything from Search Engines, Search Marketing, and Paid Advertising to Social Media, and Mobile Marketing to Analytics and beyond. Come over and get certificates by "EI Systems" to learn the sexiest form of marketing in the 21 st century.

So you are interested in entrepreneurship and have rummaged through the internet learning about the ideas and people…Now put all your hard-earned knowledge to use at the E-Quiz brought to you by Quizinc in association with Entrepreneurship Development Cell, NIT Durgapur at E-Summit 2018. Are you up for the challenge?

Always wanted to invest in the stock market? Afraid of losing your money? This E- Summit GLUG in association with EDC, NIT Durgapur brings to you FreeMax, the simulated stock market where you get to test your investment skills without the monetary risk…So lets see how rich you can get…
